import React, { useMemo, useState } from "react"; import { Card, CardContent } from "./ui/card"; import { Badge } from "./ui/badge"; import { Dialog, DialogContent } from "./ui/dialog"; import { X, Download, Calendar, Camera as CameraIcon, ChevronLeft, ChevronRight } from "lucide-react"; import { Button } from "./ui/button"; interface EvidenceItem { id: string; incident_id: string; weapon_type: string; confidence: number; timestamp: string; camera_name: string; image_url: string; } const mockEvidence: EvidenceItem[] = [ { id: "EV-001", incident_id: "INC-001", weapon_type: "Pistola", confidence: 0.94, timestamp: "2026-02-09 14:32:15", camera_name: "Entrada Principal", image_url: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1557597774-9d273605dfa9?w=800", }, { id: "EV-002", incident_id: "INC-002", weapon_type: "Rifle", confidence: 0.87, timestamp: "2026-02-09 13:18:42", camera_name: "Estacionamiento", image_url: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1551836022-d5d88e9218df?w=800", }, { id: "EV-003", incident_id: "INC-003", weapon_type: "Cuchillo", confidence: 0.76, timestamp: "2026-02-09 12:05:28", camera_name: "Pasillo Norte", image_url: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1568605114967-8130f3a36994?w=800", }, { id: "EV-004", incident_id: "INC-004", weapon_type: "Pistola", confidence: 0.91, timestamp: "2026-02-09 11:44:11", camera_name: "Recepción", image_url: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1486312338219-ce68d2c6f44d?w=800", }, { id: "EV-005", incident_id: "INC-005", weapon_type: "Objeto sospechoso", confidence: 0.68, timestamp: "2026-02-09 10:22:33", camera_name: "Salida Trasera", image_url: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1518770660439-4636190af475?w=800", }, { id: "EV-006", incident_id: "INC-006", weapon_type: "Pistola", confidence: 0.82, timestamp: "2026-02-09 09:15:47", camera_name: "Entrada Principal", image_url: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1557597774-9d273605dfa9?w=800", }, { id: "EV-007", incident_id: "INC-007", weapon_type: "Rifle", confidence: 0.89, timestamp: "2026-02-09 08:42:19", camera_name: "Estacionamiento", image_url: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1551836022-d5d88e9218df?w=800", }, { id: "EV-008", incident_id: "INC-008", weapon_type: "Pistola", confidence: 0.93, timestamp: "2026-02-09 07:28:54", camera_name: "Recepción", image_url: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1486312338219-ce68d2c6f44d?w=800", }, { id: "EV-009", incident_id: "INC-009", weapon_type: "Cuchillo", confidence: 0.79, timestamp: "2026-02-09 06:15:30", camera_name: "Pasillo Norte", image_url: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1568605114967-8130f3a36994?w=800", }, ]; function confidenceColor(conf: number) { if (conf >= 0.9) return "bg-emerald-600"; if (conf >= 0.75) return "bg-amber-600"; return "bg-rose-600"; } export function Evidence() { const [selectedEvidence, setSelectedEvidence] = useState(null); const [isModalOpen, setIsModalOpen] = useState(false); // ✅ PAGINACIÓN const pageSize = 8; // <- cambia a 5 si quieres (5 en 5) const [page, setPage] = useState(1); const totalPages = Math.max(1, Math.ceil(mockEvidence.length / pageSize)); const pageData = useMemo(() => { const start = (page - 1) * pageSize; return mockEvidence.slice(start, start + pageSize); }, [page]); const canPrev = page > 1; const canNext = page < totalPages; const goPrev = () => setPage((p) => Math.max(1, p - 1)); const goNext = () => setPage((p) => Math.min(totalPages, p + 1)); const avgConfidence = useMemo(() => { if (!mockEvidence.length) return 0; const avg = mockEvidence.reduce((acc, e) => acc + e.confidence, 0) / mockEvidence.length; return Math.round(avg * 100); }, []); const handleImageClick = (evidence: EvidenceItem) => { setSelectedEvidence(evidence); setIsModalOpen(true); }; return (
{/* ✅ Header compacto */}

Galería de Evidencias

Capturas visuales de todas las detecciones registradas

{/* ✅ Stats más pequeñas */}

Total de Evidencias

{mockEvidence.length}

Hoy

{mockEvidence.length}

Confianza Promedio

{avgConfidence}%

AI
{/* ✅ Grid más compacto (cards más pequeñas) */}
{pageData.map((evidence) => ( handleImageClick(evidence)} >
{(evidence.confidence * 100).toFixed(0)}%
{evidence.weapon_type}
{evidence.id} {evidence.weapon_type}
{evidence.timestamp}
{evidence.camera_name}
))}
{/* ✅ Footer paginación */}

Mostrando{" "} {(page - 1) * pageSize + 1} {" - "} {Math.min(page * pageSize, mockEvidence.length)} {" "} de {mockEvidence.length}

{page} / {totalPages}
{/* ✅ Modal compacto */} {selectedEvidence && (

Detalle de Evidencia

ID Evidencia

{selectedEvidence.id}

ID Incidente

{selectedEvidence.incident_id}

Tipo de Arma

{selectedEvidence.weapon_type}

Confianza

{(selectedEvidence.confidence * 100).toFixed(2)}%

Fecha y Hora

{selectedEvidence.timestamp}

Cámara

{selectedEvidence.camera_name}

)}
); }
